entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 10:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of wet snow. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of wet snow early this morning. 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:20 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wet snow or rain beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 06:20 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or wet flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Wet snow or rain changing to rain showers late in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:20 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
